name: Nayak: The Real Hero
summary_text: A man accepts a challenge by the chief minister of Maharashtra to run the state for one day, and makes such a success of it that soon he is embroiled in political intrigue.

name: The Alamo
summary_text: In 1836, a small band of soldiers sacrifice their lives in hopeless combat against a massive army in order to prevent a tyrant from smashing the new Republic of Texas.

name: You, the Living
summary_text: You, the Living is a film about humankind, its greatness and its baseness, joy and sorrow, its self-confidence and anxiety, its desire to love and be loved.

name: How to Be a Latin Lover
summary_text: Finding himself dumped after twenty-five years of marriage, a man who made a career of seducing rich older women must move in with his estranged sister, where he begins to learn the value of family.

name: Breaking In
summary_text: A woman fights to protect her family during a home invasion.

name: Set It Off
summary_text: Desperation drives four inner-city women to bank robbery in Los Angeles, then they start mistrusting each other.

name: The Banger Sisters
summary_text: Lavinia and Suzette, former rock groupies and best friends, reconnect after twenty years; one is still as wild as ever, while the other has adopted a more conservative lifestyle.

name: Wrong Turn
summary_text: Friends hiking the Appalachian Trail are confronted by 'The Foundation', a community of people who have lived in the mountains for hundreds of years.

name: Message from the King
summary_text: A mysterious outsider from South Africa, named Jacob King, arrives in Los Angeles to look for his missing younger sister.

name: Benny's Video
summary_text: A 14-year-old video enthusiast is so caught up in film fantasy that he can no longer relate to the real world, to such an extent that he commits murder and records an on-camera confession for his parents.

name: Quo vadis, Aida?
summary_text: Aida is a translator for the UN in the small town of Srebrenica. When the Serbian army takes over the town, her family is among the thousands of citizens looking for shelter in the UN camp.

name: The Dead Girl
summary_text: The clues to a young woman's death come together as the lives of seemingly unrelated people begin to intersect.

name: Swiss Family Robinson
summary_text: A Swiss family must survive being shipwrecked on a deserted island.

name: Corpus Christi
summary_text: Daniel experiences a spiritual transformation in a detention center. Although his criminal record prevents him from applying to the seminary, he has no intention of giving up his dream and decides to minister a small-town parish.

name: Very Good Girls
summary_text: Two New York City girls make a pact to lose their virginity during their first summer out of high school. When they both fall for the same street artist, the friends find their connection tested for the first time.

name: Purple Noon
summary_text: Tom Ripley is a talented mimic, moocher, forger and all-around criminal improviser; but there's more to Tom Ripley than even he can guess.

name: The Myth
summary_text: Archeologist Jack keeps having reoccurring dreams of a past life, where he is the great General Meng Yi, who is sworn to protect a Korean Princess named Ok-Soo. Jack decides to go investigate everything with his friend William.

name: Burnt by the Sun
summary_text: In the Soviet Union in 1936, shadow of Stalin's repressions lie on a famous revolution hero. The accusations of being him a foreign spy are nonsense, and all known that, but a slow process of his life's downfall is already running.

name: To the Forest of Firefly Lights
summary_text: Hotaru is rescued by a spirit when she gets lost in a forest as a child. The two become friends, despite the spirit revealing that he will disappear if he is ever touched by a human.

name: Below Zero
summary_text: On a lonely road, a prison transport is brutally assaulted. Martin, the policeman who was driving, survives and fortifies his position while the con men search for a way to finish him.

name: Raising Cain
summary_text: The oncologist wife of a prominent child psychologist suspects her husband has an unhealthy scientific obsession with their child, unaware of what - or who - is really going on inside his head.

name: OtherLife
summary_text: After inventing a drug that induces time-compressed virtual realities, young Ren grapples with partner Sam over how to use their powerful creation.

name: The Scarlet Letter
summary_text: An affair between a young woman and a pastor has disastrous consequences.

name: Who's Your Caddy?
summary_text: When a rap mogul from Atlanta tries to join a conservative country club in the Carolinas he runs into fierce opposition from the board President- but it's nothing that he and his entourage can't handle.

name: Marmaduke
summary_text: A suburban family moves to a new neighborhood with their large, yet lovable Great Dane, who has a tendency to wreak havoc in his own oblivious way.

name: Singham
summary_text: A truly honest police officer is transferred to a town controlled by a gangster he has humiliated. The gangster believes he can use good power to bring down this officer who made him look foolish and weak.

name: The Stuff
summary_text: A delicious, mysterious goo that oozes from the earth is marketed as the newest dessert sensation, but the tasty treat rots more than teeth when zombie-like snackers who only want to consume more of the strange substance at any cost begin infesting the world.

name: Home Sweet Hell
summary_text: Don Champagne seems to have it all, but when his wife, Mona, learns of his affair with a pretty new salesgirl, she will stop at nothing to maintain their storybook life.

name: Gossip
summary_text: Three college students base their class project around gossip and how fast it spreads, which soon spirals out of control.

name: Struck by Lightning
summary_text: A high schooler recounts the way he blackmailed his fellow classmates into contributing to his literary magazine.

name: I'm Not Scared
summary_text: A young boy accidentally discovers a deep hole in the ground, where another boy is kept prisoner.

name: From Prada to Nada
summary_text: A Latina spin on Jane Austen's "Sense and Sensibility," where two spoiled sisters who have been left penniless after their father's sudden death are forced to move in with their estranged aunt in East Los Angeles.

name: Leatherface: Texas Chainsaw Massacre III
summary_text: A California couple and a survivalist encounter Leatherface and his family.

name: Beyond the Sea
summary_text: A swooning study of "Mack the Knife" singer Bobby Darin and specifically his relationship with wife Sandra Dee.

name: The Man Who Cried
summary_text: A young refugee traveling from Russia to America in search of her lost father falls for a gypsy horseman.

name: Rory O'Shea Was Here
summary_text: When the kinetic Rory moves into his room in the Carrigmore Residential Home for the Disabled, his effect on the home is immediate. Most telling is his friendship with Michael, a young man with cerebral palsy and nearly unintelligible speech. Somehow, Rory understands Michael, and encourages him to experience life outside the confines of home.

name: Ready to Wear
summary_text: A chronicle of the interconnected lives of a group of people in the lead up to Paris Fashion Week.

name: The American Friend
summary_text: Tom Ripley, who deals in forged art, suggests a picture framer he knows would make a good hit man.

name: The Woman in the Window
summary_text: A conservative middle aged professor engages in a relationship with a femme fatale, he's plunged into a nightmarish world of blackmail and murder.

name: Lie with Me
summary_text: An outgoing, sexually aggressive young woman meets and begins a torrid affair with an equally aggressive young man in which their affair begins to bring a strain on their personal lives.

name: At Close Range
summary_text: Reunited with his career criminal father, tough teen Brad thinks he's found his ticket to an exciting life of crime, only to find out he's wrong.

name: Blood: The Last Vampire
summary_text: A vampire named Saya, who is part of covert government agency that hunts and destroys demons in a post-WWII Japan, is inserted in a military school to discover which one of her classmates is a demon in disguise.

name: The Life and Death of Peter Sellers
summary_text: The feature adaptation of Roger Lewis' book about the actor best remembered as Inspector Clouseau in the Pink Panther movies.

name: Down to You
summary_text: A young man wins and loses the first serious love of his life. Al Connelly falls in love with the girl of his dreams. After the summer she breaks up with him. As he tries to recover Al goes to desperate measures.

name: Mr. Magoo
summary_text: The myopic millionaire defeats jewel smugglers in his usual bumbling manner.

name: Biloxi Blues
summary_text: A group of young recruits go through boot camp during the Second World War in Biloxi, Mississippi. From the play by Neil Simon.

name: Barbershop: The Next Cut
summary_text: As their surrounding community has taken a turn for the worse, the crew at Calvin's Barbershop come together to bring some much needed change to their neighborhood.

name: The Professionals
summary_text: An arrogant Texas millionaire hires four adventurers to rescue his kidnapped wife from a notorious Mexican bandit.

name: The Vatican Tapes
summary_text: A priest and two Vatican exorcists must do battle with an ancient satanic force to save the soul of a young woman.

name: Alien Nation
summary_text: In 1988, Earth makes the first contact with an alien civilization. In 1991, these aliens, known as Newcomers, slowly begin to be integrated into human society after three years of quarantine.

name: Paulie
summary_text: Paulie, a talking parrot, recounts his travels looking for his original owner to a Russian janitor who helps him to the end of his journey.

name: Lion of the Desert
summary_text: In 1929, Italian Fascist dictator Benito Mussolini appoints General Rodolfo Graziani as colonial governor to Italian Libya with orders to stamp-out all resistance from Libyan nationalists led by rebel guerrilla leader Omar Mukhtar.

name: Running on Empty
summary_text: The eldest son of a fugitive family comes of age and wants to live a life of his own.

name: Lore
summary_text: As the Allies sweep across Germany, Lore leads her siblings on a journey that exposes them to the truth of their parents' beliefs. An encounter with a mysterious refugee forces Lore to rely on a person she has always been taught to hate.

name: Kiss of the Spider Woman
summary_text: A gay man and a political prisoner are together in a prison. The gay man narrates the stories of two fake movies and his own life.

name: Intolerance
summary_text: The story of a poor young woman, separated by prejudice from her husband and baby, is interwoven with tales of intolerance from throughout history.

name: Contracted
summary_text: After being drugged and raped at a party, a young woman contracts what she thinks is an STD; but, it's actually something much worse.

name: An Officer and a Spy
summary_text: In 1894, French Captain Alfred Dreyfus is wrongfully convicted of treason and sentenced to life imprisonment at Devil's island.

name: Love, Guaranteed
summary_text: To save her small law firm, earnest lawyer Susan takes a high-paying case from Nick, a charming new client who wants to sue a dating website that guarantees love. But as the case heats up, so do Susan and Nick's feelings for each other.

name: Klass
summary_text: An average guy of an Estonian high-school decides to defend his bullied classmate. This starts war between him and the informal leader of the class. As teenagers' honour is a touchy thing, everything ends in bloodshed.

name: The New Daughter
summary_text: A single father moves his two children to rural South Carolina, only to watch his daughter exhibit increasingly strange behavior.

name: Theri
summary_text: When his daughter's life is endangered by a local gang, Joseph Kuruvilla will do whatever it takes to stop them. However, at the same time, his dangerous past slowly resurfaces.

name: 10 Items or Less
summary_text: An actor prepping for an upcoming role meets a quirky grocery clerk, and together they hit the road to show each other their respective worlds.

name: A Very Murray Christmas
summary_text: Bill Murray worries no one will show up to his TV show due to a terrible snowstorm in New York City.

name: Water
summary_text: Set in colonial India against Gandhi's rise to power, it's the story of 8-year-old Chuyia, who is widowed and sent to a home to live in penitence; once there, Chuyia's feisty presence deeply affects the lives of the other residents.

name: Rose Island
summary_text: An idealistic engineer builds his own island off the Italian coast and declares it a nation, drawing the world's attention. Values are tested when the Italian Government declares him an enemy, but to change the world risks must be taken.

name: The Occupant
summary_text: Javier Muñoz, once a successful executive, makes the fateful decision to leave his home, which he and his family can no longer afford.

name: High Society
summary_text: With socialite Tracy Lord about to remarry, her ex-husband - with the help of a sympathetic reporter - has 48 hours to convince her that she really still loves him.

name: Lootcase
summary_text: Nandan Kumar comes across a suitcase and discovers it is full of cash. He takes the suitcase and soon finds himself being chased by a notorious gangster, an honest cop and a minister, who want the suitcase at any cost.

name: The Ipcress File
summary_text: In London, a counter espionage Agent deals with his own bureaucracy while investigating the kidnapping and brainwashing of British scientists.

name: I Want You
summary_text: The sequel of Three Meters Above The Sky, starts with the return of H to his hometown where reconnecting with the past means struggle and also a new love.

name: The Road Within
summary_text: A young man with Tourette's Syndrome embarks on a road trip with his recently-deceased mother's ashes.

name: Hot Summer Nights
summary_text: In the summer of 1991, a sheltered teenage boy comes of age during a wild summer he spends on Cape Cod getting rich from selling pot to gangsters, falling in love for the first time, partying and eventually realizing that he is in over his head.

name: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral
summary_text: Lawman Wyatt Earp and outlaw Doc Holliday form an unlikely alliance which culminates in their participation in the legendary Gunfight at the O.K. Corral.

name: The War with Grandpa
summary_text: Upset that he has to share the room he loves with his grandfather, Peter decides to declare war in an attempt to get it back.

name: Persuasion
summary_text: Anne was in love with Frederick, who was rejected by her snobby parents 8 years ago. They've now hit hard times and rent out their mansion to his brother-in-law. He returns a Royal Navy captain. Will he remember Anne?

name: Singh Is King
summary_text: A comic caper about Happy Singh, a Punjabi villager who goes through a series of misadventures and eventually becomes the King of the Australian underworld.

name: Azumi
summary_text: Raised to deal in cold blooded death, the teenage assassin girl Azumi must defeat three evil warlords while also battling her own heart.

name: Better Living Through Chemistry
summary_text: A strait-laced pharmacist's uneventful life spirals out of control when he starts an affair with a trophy-wife customer who takes him on a joyride involving sex, drugs and possibly murder.

name: The Philadelphia Experiment
summary_text: A United States Navy destroyer escort participates in a Navy "invisibility" experiment that inadvertently sends two sailors forty years into the future.

name: The Captain
summary_text: In the last moments of World War II, a young German soldier fighting for survival finds a Nazi captain's uniform. Impersonating an officer, the man quickly takes on the monstrous identity of the perpetrators he's escaping from.

name: Ordet
summary_text: Follows the lives of the Borgen family, as they deal with inner conflict, as well as religious conflict with each other, and the rest of the town.

name: Ko to tamo peva
summary_text: It's April 5, 1941, somewhere in Serbia. A group of people go on a bus to Belgrade, on a journey that will change their lives forever.

name: Elling
summary_text: When his mother, who has sheltered him his entire 40 years, dies, Elling, a sensitive, would-be poet, is sent to live in a state institution. There he meets Kjell Bjarne, a gentle giant and...                See full summary »

name: Unforgettable
summary_text: A woman sets out to make life a living hell for her ex-husband's new fiancée.

name: Breathe In
summary_text: When a foreign exchange student arrives in a small upstate New York town, she challenges the dynamics of her host family's relationships and alters their lives forever.

name: Death Wish 3
summary_text: Architect/vigilante Paul Kersey arrives back in New York City and is forcibly recruited by a crooked police chief to fight street crime caused by a large gang terrorizing the neighborhoods.

name: Above the Rim
summary_text: Story of a promising high school basketball star and his relationships with two brothers, one a drug dealer and the other a former basketball star fallen on hard times and now employed as a security guard.

name: The Vanishing
summary_text: Three lighthouse keepers on the remote Flannan Isles find a hidden trunk of gold, leading to their mysterious disappearance.

name: The Wizard
summary_text: A boy and his brother run away from home and hitch cross country with the help of a girl they meet to compete in the ultimate video game championship.

name: 7 Days in Entebbe
summary_text: Inspired by the true events of the 1976 hijacking of an Air France flight en route from Tel Aviv to Paris, and the most daring rescue mission ever attempted.

name: Halloweentown
summary_text: When a young girl living with her good-witch grandmother learns she too is a witch, she must help her grandmother save Halloweentown from evil forces.

name: Just One of the Guys
summary_text: Terry feels discriminated against when the summer jobs at Sun Tribune go to 2 guys. She decides to do something about it. She dresses like a guy and gets a haircut. Will students at the other high school notice? Girls notice "him".

name: Barbershop 2: Back in Business
summary_text: The owner of an historic South Side Chicago barbershop is pressured to sell out to a land developer, but must face the impact this would have on his close-knit community.

name: The Unknown Woman
summary_text: Haunted by a horrible past, a young Ukrainian woman calculatedly insinuates herself into the life of a rich Italian family.

name: Medianeras
summary_text: Martín and Mariana are slightly damaged people who live in buildings just opposite one another. While they often don't notice each other, separation might be the very thing that brings them together.

name: A Futile and Stupid Gesture
summary_text: In the 1970s and '80s, National Lampoon's success and influence creates a new media empire overseen in part by the brilliant and troubled Douglas Kenney.

name: Body of Evidence
summary_text: A lawyer defends a woman accused of killing her older lover by having sex with him.

name: The Wedding Banquet
summary_text: To satisfy his nagging parents, a gay landlord and a female tenant agree to a marriage of convenience, but his parents arrive to visit and things get out of hand.

name: Welcome to Collinwood
summary_text: Cosimo gets a plan for a huge job from his cellmate. He asks his woman to find a patsy for his bungled car theft, offering $15,000. Suddenly, 7 are involved.

name: Mr. India
summary_text: A poor but big-hearted man takes orphans into his home. After discovering his scientist father's invisibility device, he rises to the occasion and fights to save his children and all of India from the clutches of a megalomaniac.

name: Night Shift
summary_text: A morgue attendant is talked into running a brothel at his workplace after a deceased pimp is sent there. However, the pimp's killers don't look too kindly on this new 'business', nor does the morgue's owner.

name: Yankee Doodle Dandy
summary_text: The life of the renowned musical composer, playwright, actor, dancer, and singer George M. Cohan.

name: The Mitchells vs the Machines
summary_text: A quirky, dysfunctional family's road trip is upended when they find themselves in the middle of the robot apocalypse and suddenly become humanity's unlikeliest last hope.

name: Let Him Go
summary_text: A retired sheriff and his wife, grieving over the death of their son, set out to find their only grandson.

name: The Woman in Red
summary_text: On his way to work, Teddy spots Charlotte, an incredibly beautiful Woman in Red. He really wants to meet her, but what would his wife say?

name: Uncle Boonmee Who Can Recall His Past Lives
summary_text: Dying of kidney disease, a man spends his last, somber days with family, including the ghost of his wife and a forest spirit who used to be his son, on a rural northern Thailand farm.

name: Still Walking
summary_text: A family gathers together for a commemorative ritual whose nature only gradually becomes clear.

name: Battle in Seattle
summary_text: Activists arrive in Seattle, Washington en masse to protest a meeting of the World Trade Organization. Riots and chaos ensue as demonstrators successfully stop the WTO meetings.

name: Year of the Dragon
summary_text: A police detective cracks down on organized crime in Chinatown after the murders of Triad and Mafia leaders.

name: Little Monsters
summary_text: A washed-up musician teams up with a teacher and a kids show personality to protect young children from a sudden outbreak of zombies.

name: High Heels
summary_text: A singer returns after 15 years abroad to perform in Madrid and finds her 27 y.o. daughter married to one of her mom's ex-lovers.

name: The Sea of Trees
summary_text: A suicidal American befriends a Japanese man lost in a forest near Mt. Fuji and the two search for a way out.

name: Subway
summary_text: On improvising a burglary at a shady tycoon's home, Fred takes refuge in the hip and surreal universe of the Paris Metro and encounters its assorted denizens, the tycoon's henchmen and his disenchanted young wife.

name: A Face in the Crowd
summary_text: A female radio reporter turns a folk-singing drifter into a powerful media star.

name: Thunderheart
summary_text: A young mixed-blood FBI agent is assigned to work with a cynical veteran investigator on a murder on a poverty-stricken Sioux reservation.

name: The Heiress
summary_text: A young naive woman falls for a handsome young man who her emotionally abusive father suspects is a fortune hunter.

name: Love in the Afternoon
summary_text: A middle-aged playboy becomes fascinated by the daughter of a private detective who has been hired to entrap him with the wife of a client.

name: Bride of Re-Animator
summary_text: Doctors Herbert West and Dan Cain discover the secret to creating human life and proceed to create a perfect woman from dead tissue.

name: Night of the Demons
summary_text: Ten teenagers party at an abandoned funeral parlor on Halloween night. When an evil force awakens, demonic spirits keep them from leaving and turn their gathering into a living Hell.

name: Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London
summary_text: With all-new gadgets, high-flying action, exciting chases and a wisecracking new handler, Derek (Anthony Anderson), Cody has to retrieve the device before the world's leaders fall under the evil control of a diabolical villain.

name: My Fellow Americans
summary_text: Two former U. S. Presidents, hated rivals, join forces to expose the current, corrupt President at the risk of their lives.

name: Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore
summary_text: The on-going war between the canine and feline species is put on hold when they join forces to thwart a rogue cat spy with her own sinister plans for conquest.

name: Mary Reilly
summary_text: A housemaid falls in love with Dr. Henry Jekyll and his darkly mysterious counterpart, Mr. Edward Hyde.

name: The Great Silence
summary_text: A mute gunfighter defends a young widow and a group of outlaws against a gang of bounty killers in the winter of 1898, and a grim, tense struggle unfolds.

name: Senseless
summary_text: A student gets his senses enhanced by an experimental drug. But abuse is not an option.

name: Baby Boom
summary_text: The life of super-yuppie J.C. is thrown into turmoil when she inherits a baby from a distant relative.

name: The Last Supper
summary_text: A group of idealistic, but frustrated, liberals succumb to the temptation of murdering rightwing pundits for their political beliefs.

name: The Lifeguard
summary_text: A former valedictorian quits her reporter job in New York and returns to the place she last felt happy: her childhood home in Connecticut. She gets work as a lifeguard and starts a dangerous relationship with a troubled teenager.

name: Red Desert
summary_text: In an industrial area, Giuliana, an unstable woman, attempts to cope with life by starting an affair with a co-worker at the plant her husband manages.

name: Bad Boys
summary_text: Chicago crime kid Mick O'Brien is sent to reform school after accidentally killing a rival's kid brother.

name: Bobby Z
summary_text: A DEA agent provides former Marine Tim Kearney with a way out of his prison sentence: impersonate Bobby Z, a recently deceased drug dealer, in a hostage switch with a crime lord.

name: Lovewrecked
summary_text: On a Caribbean cruise, Jenny is marooned on a beach with her rock and roll idol. Deliriously in love with the idea of time alone with him, she manages to hide the fact that they're a stone's throw away from their resort.

name: Zügürt Aga
summary_text: The landowner (Agha) of the Haraptar village marries off his old father with the young and beautiful Kiraz. But on the nuptial night, his father dies and everything starts to go bad for the...                See full summary »

name: Pusher III
summary_text: Milo tries to be a family man and run his criminal organization, but a wrong drug shipment endangers everything.

name: Summer Rental
summary_text: An overworked air-traffic controller takes his family on a beach vacation but is soon beset by series of mishaps.

name: Powder Blue
summary_text: Four Los Angelenos, a mortician, an ex-con, a suicidal ex-priest, and a stripper, are brought together on Christmas Eve by a mixture of circumstances.

name: One Crazy Summer
summary_text: An aspiring teenage cartoonist and his friends come to the aid of a singer trying to save her family property from developers.

name: Garam Masala
summary_text: A rib tickling tale of two flirts who constantly flirt with women despite one of them being engaged. Chaos ensues when the fiancé finds out that her to-be groom is cheating on her.

name: A Fantastic Fear of Everything
summary_text: A crime novelist, whose research on Victorian serial killers has turned him into a paranoid wreck, must confront his worst fears, when a film executive takes a sudden interest in his movie script.

name: The Willoughbys
summary_text: Convinced they'd be better off raising themselves, the Willoughby children hatch a sneaky plan to send their selfish parents on vacation. The siblings then embark on their own high-flying adventure to find the true meaning of family.

name: Mediterraneo
summary_text: In WW2, an Italian Army unit of misfits occupies an isolated non-strategic Greek island for the duration of the war.

name: Faust
summary_text: The demon Mephisto wagers with God that he can corrupt a mortal man's soul.

name: Batman: Gotham by Gaslight
summary_text: In an alternative Victorian Age Gotham City, Batman begins his war on crime while he investigates a new series of murders by Jack the Ripper.

name: Ocean Waves
summary_text: As a young man returns home after his first year away at college he recalls his senior year of high school and the iron-willed, big city girl that turned his world upside down.

name: Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2
summary_text: After falling in love, three roommates experience changes in their lives.

name: The Death of Mr. Lazarescu
summary_text: Mr. Lãzãrescu, a dying old man, is shuttled from hospital to hospital by a loyal paramedic as doctors refuse to operate and no one can agree on a diagnosis.

name: Exposed
summary_text: A police detective investigates the truth behind his partner's death. The mysterious case reveals disturbing police corruption and a dangerous secret involving an unlikely young woman.

name: The Devils
summary_text: In 17th-century France, Father Urbain Grandier seeks to protect the city of Loudun from the corrupt establishment of Cardinal Richelieu. Hysteria occurs within the city when he is accused of witchcraft by a sexually repressed nun.

name: For Your Consideration
summary_text: Three actors learn that their respective performances in the film "Home for Purim," a drama set in the mid-1940s American South, are generating award-season buzz.

name: The Princess and the Warrior
summary_text: Two enamoured strangers look for a warm place in a cold world.

name: Days of Glory
summary_text: During WWII, four North African men enlist in the French army to liberate that country from Nazi oppression, and to fight French discrimination.

name: Border
summary_text: In 1971, along the border region of Longewala, a small battalion of Indian soldiers goes up against a large Pakistani strike force.

name: The Intruder
summary_text: A young married couple buys a beautiful house on several acres of land, only to find out that the man they bought it from refuses to let go of the property.

name: American Warrior
summary_text: American soldier, obviously very skilled in martial arts, single-handedly takes on mercenaries in the Philippines.

name: Radius
summary_text: A man wakes up with no memory of who he is, and finds that everyone who comes within a certain distance of him suddenly dies.

name: Infini
summary_text: An elite 'search and rescue' team transport onto an off-world mining-facility to rescue Whit Carmichael, the lone survivor of a biological outbreak.

name: Critters 2
summary_text: Eggs of the small but voracious alien creatures called Crites are left behind on earth and, after hatching, set their appetites on the small farm town of Grover's Bend.

name: Northanger Abbey
summary_text: A young woman's penchant for sensational Gothic novels leads to misunderstandings in the matters of the heart.

name: Return of the Living Dead III
summary_text: Having recently witnessed the horrific results of a top secret project to bring the dead back to life, a distraught youth performs the operation on his girlfriend after she's killed in a motorcycle accident.

name: Gulaal
summary_text: A law student witnesses deception, homicide, and crime after being elected as General Secretary of his college.

name: 6 Bullets
summary_text: An ex-mercenary known for finding missing children is hired by a mixed martial arts fighter whose daughter has been kidnapped.

name: Knock Off
summary_text: A fashion designer must join forces with a C.I.A. agent to combat terrorism.

name: Eyyvah Eyvah 2
summary_text: A clarinetist from a village in Turkey's Thracian region tries to reach his fiancé, who works as a nurse in a village near Çanakkale, to give her a ring to win back her heart.

name: Three Women
summary_text: Two roommates/physical therapists, one a vain woman and the other a mysterious teenager, share a bizarre relationship.

name: The Wild Thornberrys
summary_text: Eliza (Lacey Chabert) and Debbie (Danielle Harris) are two sisters who don't always get along. But their relationship is put to the test when Debbie's life is in danger, and Eliza might have to give up her power to talk to animals.

name: Ararat
summary_text: Interrogated by a customs officer, a young man recounts how his life was changed during the making of a film about the Armenian genocide.

name: The Great Muppet Caper
summary_text: Kermit the Frog, The Great Gonzo, and Fozzie Bear are reporters who travel to Britain to interview a rich victim of jewel thieves and help her along with her secretary, Miss Piggy.

name: Taxi
summary_text: Jafar Panahi is banned from making movies by the Iranian government, he poses as a taxi driver and makes a movie about social challenges in Iran.

name: Le chant du loup
summary_text: In the near future, a French submarine finds itself in a crisis situation.

name: The Musketeer
summary_text: Alexander Dumas' novel is updated with an eastern influence as D'Artagnan attempts to join the king's elite guards, the Royal Musketeers, and find the man who killed his parents.

name: Trees Lounge
summary_text: Tommy is an unemployed mechanic who spends most of his time in a bar (Trees Lounge) in a small blue collar town. He seems to always be thinking, "If only X then I could stop drinking".
Twelve jurors must decide the fate of a Chechen adolescent charged with murdering his stepfather.

name: Suddenly, Last Summer
summary_text: A surgeon is assigned the case of a young woman whose aunt wants her lobotomized to cover up a family secret.

name: Elvira: Mistress of the Dark
summary_text: Upon arriving in a small town where she has inherited a rundown mansion, a famous horror hostess battles an evil uncle, and townspeople who want her burned at the stake.

name: Gotti
summary_text: The story of crime boss John Gotti and his son.

name: Frantz
summary_text: In the aftermath of WWI, a young German who grieves the death of her fiancé in France meets a mysterious Frenchman who visits the fiancé's grave to lay flowers.

name: American Outlaws
summary_text: 5 Southern friends return home when the war ends 1865. But Yankee soldiers and Pinkerton are busy helping a railroad baron grab land from farmers along the planned railroad west. The 5 friends fight back.

name: Toy Story of Terror
summary_text: Woody and the gang are held up at a roadside motel and members of the group start to disappear from everywhere. Woody and set about getting to the bottom of the mystery.

name: A Late Quartet
summary_text: Members of a world-renowned string quartet struggle to stay together in the face of death, competing egos and insuppressible lust.

name: Imagine That
summary_text: A financial executive who can't stop his career downspiral is invited into his daughter's imaginary world, where solutions to his problems await.

name: Children Who Chase Lost Voices
summary_text: A coming of age story involving young love and a mysterious music, coming from a crystal radio left as a memento by an absent father, that leads a young heroine deep into a hidden world.

name: Some Kind of Beautiful
summary_text: A drama about a Cambridge poetry professor who begins to re-evaluate his life of Byronic excess.

name: Little Man Tate
summary_text: A single mother raises a child prodigy on her own, struggling to give him every opportunity he needs to express his gift.

name: The Baytown Outlaws
summary_text: When three redneck brothers agree to help a woman save her godson from an abusive stepfather, they become targets on the run from an odd cast of characters.

name: Holy Smoke
summary_text: Ruth's been brainwashed by a guru in Delhi, India. Her parents in Sydney hire a specialist in reversing this. Ruth is tricked to return to Australia and is isolated in an outback cabin with the specialist. It gets messy.

name: Missing in Action
summary_text: Colonel Braddock launches a mission deep into the jungles of Vietnam to find the POW camp that he escaped from and free the Americans still held captive there.

name: Look Away
summary_text: Maria, an alienated high-school student, has her life turned upside down when she switches places with her sinister mirror image.

name: The Big White
summary_text: To remedy his financial problems, a travel agent has his eye on a frozen corpse, which just happens to be sought after by two hitmen.

name: Mulk
summary_text: One family member tries to help her own family which are trapped in a dark controversy.

name: Dostana
summary_text: Two straight guys pretend to be gay in order to secure a Miami apartment. When both of them fall for their roommate Neha, hilarity ensues as they strive to convince one and all that they're gay whilst secretly trying to win her heart.

name: The Wiz
summary_text: An adaptation of "The Wizard of Oz" that tries to capture the essence of the African-American experience.

name: Black Sunday
summary_text: A vengeful witch and her fiendish servant return from the grave and begin a bloody campaign to possess the body of the witch's beautiful look-alike descendant, with only the girl's brother and a handsome doctor standing in her way.

name: Dreamscape
summary_text: A young psychic on the run from himself is recruited by a government agency experimenting with the use of the dream-sharing technology and is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of the U.S. president.

name: Two Days in New York
summary_text: Manhattan couple Marion and Mingus, who each have children from prior relationships, find their comfortable family dynamic jostled by a visit from Marion's relatives.

name: Foul Play
summary_text: A shy San Francisco librarian and a bumbling cop fall in love as they solve a crime involving albinos, dwarves, and the Catholic Church.

name: Dragon
summary_text: A papermaker gets involved with a murder case concerning two criminals leading to a determined detective suspecting him and the former's vicious father searching for him

name: Bless the Child
summary_text: Cody, a little girl abandoned by her mother and raised by her aunt, a nurse, is kidnapped. The girl's guardian, aided by an F.B.I. agent, learn that Cody has supernatural abilities, and the abductees are a Satanic cult willing to do anything to gain them.

name: Creation
summary_text: Torn between faith and science, and suffering hallucinations, English naturalist Charles Darwin struggles to complete 'On the Origin of Species' and maintain his relationship with his wife.
Roger Maris and Mickey Mantle race to break Babe Ruth's single-season home run record.

name: Pred dozhdot
summary_text: Three interconnected stories of love under the threat of civil war in Macedonia and London.

name: Revanche
summary_text: Ex-con Alex plans to flee to the South with his girl after a robbery. But something terrible happens and revenge seems inevitable.

name: Demonic
summary_text: A police officer and a psychologist investigate the deaths of five people who were killed while trying to summon ghosts.

name: Kaho Naa... Pyaar Hai
summary_text: A young girl meets the doppelganger of her deceased boyfriend and now has a chance to find the people who have murdered him.

name: Homeward Bound II: Lost in San Francisco
summary_text: When adventurous pets Chance, Shadow and Sassy are accidentally separated from their vacationing owners, they're left to fend for themselves on the mean streets of San Francisco, in search for the "golden bridge" that will take them home.

name: The Doom Generation
summary_text: Jordan White and Amy Blue, two troubled teens, pick up an adolescent drifter, Xavier Red. Together, the threesome embark on a sex-and-violence-filled journey through an America of psychos and quickie marts.

name: Cinayet Süsü
summary_text: A serial killer keeps creating crime scenes that are ridiculously decorated with paints, markings and poems everywhere. The team begin solving the most mysterious murder case of the country, using the most wrong methods.

name: Polytechnique
summary_text: A dramatization of the 1989 Montréal Massacre, during which several female engineering students were murdered by an unstable misogynist.

name: Heaven's Gate
summary_text: During the Johnson County War in 1890 Wyoming, a sheriff born into wealth does his best to protect immigrant farmers from rich cattle interests.

name: The Big Kahuna
summary_text: Two veteran salesmen dissect a sales pitch to a particular client, through their young protégé.

name: Sarkar
summary_text: An NRI businessman learns his vote has been cast by someone else and decides to investigate the matter, eventually finding himself pitted against two corrupt politicians.

name: Bandslam
summary_text: A new kid in town assembles a fledgling rock band -- together, they achieve their dreams and compete against the best in the biggest event of the year, a battle of the bands.

name: Faster, Pussycat! Kill! Kill!
summary_text: Three go-go dancers holding a young girl hostage come across a crippled old man living with his two sons in the desert. After learning he's hiding a sum of cash around, the women start scheming on him.

name: Archive
summary_text: 2038: George Almore is working on a true human-equivalent AI. His latest prototype is almost ready. This sensitive phase is also the riskiest. Especially as he has a goal that must be hidden at all costs.

name: Silent Night, Deadly Night
summary_text: Little Billy witness his parents getting killed by Santa after being warned by his senile grandpa that Santa punishes those who are naughty. Now Billy is 18, and out of the orphanage, and he has just become Santa, himself.

name: Factotum
summary_text: This drama centers on Hank Chinaski, the fictional alter-ego of "Factotum" author Charles Bukowski, who wanders around Los Angeles, CA trying to live off jobs which don't interfere with his primary interest, which is writing. Along the way, he fends off the distractions offered by women, drinking and gambling.

name: Head Over Heels
summary_text: A young woman is attracted to a man despite her thinking she's seen him kill someone.

name: Der blaue Engel
summary_text: An elderly professor's ordered life spins dangerously out of control when he falls for a nightclub singer.

name: Tiny Furniture
summary_text: About a recent college grad who returns home while she tries to figure out what to do with her life.

name: Parallels
summary_text: A mysterious building is the gateway to infinite parallel Earths.

name: A Night to Remember
summary_text: On its maiden voyage in April 1912, the supposedly unsinkable RMS Titanic hits an iceberg in the Atlantic Ocean.

name: The Rhythm Section
summary_text: A woman seeks revenge against those who orchestrated a plane crash that killed her family.

name: Interstella 5555: The 5tory of the 5ecret 5tar 5ystem
summary_text: A continuation of the story told in the Daft Punk music videos "One More Time," "Aerodynamic," "Digital Love," and "Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger."

name: Quo Vadis
summary_text: Fierce Roman commander Marcus Vinicius becomes infatuated with beautiful Christian hostage Lygia and begins questioning the tyrannical leadership of the despot Emperor Nero.

name: Slackers
summary_text: When geeky Ethan discovers three fellow students scamming the examination system, he blackmails them to win over the college's most popular girl.

name: The Brown Bunny
summary_text: Professional motorcycle racer Bud Clay heads from New Hampshire to California to race again. Along the way he meets various needy women who provide him with the cure to his own loneliness, but only a certain woman from his past will truly satisfy him.

name: Zero Effect
summary_text: The world's greatest detective Daryl Zero aided by his associate Steve Arlo investigates a complex and mysterious case of blackmail and missing keys for shady tycoon Gregory Stark who is less than forthcoming about what is really happening!

name: Replicant
summary_text: Scientists create a genetic clone of a serial killer in order to help catch the killer, teaming up with two cops.

name: Bordello of Blood
summary_text: The Crypt Keeper returns to tell the story of a funeral parlor that moonlights as a vampire bordello.

name: The Star Wars Holiday Special
summary_text: Chewbacca and Han Solo try to get to the Wookiee homeworld of Kashyyyk to celebrate Life Day, but are impeded by an Imperial blockade. Chewie's family passes the time with various forms of entertainment.

name: Richard III
summary_text: The classic Shakespearean play about the murderously scheming 15th-century king is reimagined in an alternative setting of 1930s England as clouds of fascism gather.

name: I Am Wrath
summary_text: Stanley Hill opens a can of brutal vengeance on the thugs who murdered his wife and the corrupt cops who are protecting them.

name: Black Water
summary_text: A terrifying tale of survival in the mangrove swamps of Northern Australia

name: Smilla's Sense of Snow
summary_text: A 6 y.o. Inuit boy runs off a snowy roof in Copenhagen and dies. Smilla, a half Inuit who lives in the building and knows the boy, looks into it. What makes an acrophobic boy run up on the roof? The clues take her to Greenland.

name: Christine
summary_text: The story of Christine Chubbuck, a 1970s TV reporter struggling with depression and professional frustrations as she tries to advance her career.

name: Astérix and Obélix: God Save Britannia
summary_text: Asterix crosses the channel to help second-cousin Anticlimax face down Julius Caesar and invading Romans.

name: The Defiant Ones
summary_text: Two escaped convicts chained together, white and black, must learn to get along in order to elude capture.

name: The Fury
summary_text: A former CIA agent uses the talents of a young psychic to help retrieve his telekinetic son from terrorists, who want to use his mental powers for evil.

name: Ghost in the Shell 2.0
summary_text: A hacker known as the Puppet Master is hunted by a female cyborg cop and her partner. This film is a revised version of Ghost in the Shell (1995).

name: Return to Paradise
summary_text: Two friends must choose whether to help a third friend who was arrested in Malaysia for drug possession.

name: Daniel the Wizard
summary_text: Evil assassins want to kill Daniel Kublbock, the third runner up for the German Idols.

name: The Killing Room
summary_text: Four individuals sign up for a psychological research study only to discover that they are now subjects of a brutal, classified government program.

name: Mr. 3000
summary_text: Aging baseball star who goes by the nickname, Mr. 3000, finds out many years after retirement that he didn't quite reach 3,000 hits. Now at age 47 he's back to try and reach that goal.

name: Mujhse Shaadi Karogi
summary_text: Sameer, fast at losing his temper is re-located to Goa where he falls in love with Rani. But Sameer's new roommate Sunny, has some plans of his own.

name: Pardes
summary_text: Kishorilal wants an Indian bride for his westernised son. He gets him engaged to Ganga, his friend's daughter, and brings her to USA. But she shares a deeper bond with Arjun, Kishorilal's foster son.

name: Sorority Boys
summary_text: Strapped for cash, three fraternity playboys make one last attempt to live the high life - cheaply - by masquerading as girls. But their chauvinistic ways come back to haunt them as they get a crash course in the opposite sex.

name: We're Back! A Dinosaur's Story
summary_text: A time traveling scientist goes back to prehistoric times and feeds dinosaurs a magic cereal that increases their intelligence - next they land in modern New York City for a series of comic adventures.

name: Used Cars
summary_text: When the owner of a struggling used car lot is killed, it's up to the lot's hot-shot salesman to save the property from falling into the hands of the owner's ruthless brother and used-car rival.

name: Hello, Dolly!
summary_text: Matchmaker Dolly Levi travels to Yonkers to find a partner for "half-a-millionaire" Horace Vandergelder, convincing his niece, his niece's intended, and his two clerks to travel to New York City along the way.

name: Earthquake
summary_text: Various interconnected people struggle to survive when an earthquake of unimaginable magnitude hits Los Angeles, California.
